biotools.summary: Visualizes the relationship between allele frequency and effect size in genetic association studies. The input is a data frame containing association results. The output is a plot with the effect size of risk variants in the Y axis, and the allele frequency spectrum in the X axis

bioschemas.name: TrumpetPlots
bioschemas.summary: Visualizes the relationship between allele frequency and effect size in genetic association studies. The input is a data frame containing association results. The output is a plot with the effect size of risk variants in the Y axis, and the allele frequency spectrum in the X axis
